title: Nicholas Meyer - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/27/19
itunes:title: Nicholas Meyer - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/27/19
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and screenwriter and director Nicholas Meyer explore his long career in Hollywood, and the struggles he faced creating the widely praised Star Trek film "The Wrath of Khan," which revitalized the franchise.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
